thread_title: System Discipline Infrastructure Completion and DeepSeek Weekly Review

1_narrative.title: Narrative & Context
items: A session focused on establishing system discipline lock-in for the PRJ_Enterprise_Platform project.
Created foundational documentation and automation scripts, conducted a weekly AI review, and provided technical support.

2_objectives.title: Objectives
items: Establish system discipline infrastructure.
Create master routing and project state documentation.
Build automation scripts for session wrap-up and AI review.
Conduct a weekly review with DeepSeek AI.
Create human-readable guides for the system.
Answer specific technical questions about Git, PostgreSQL, and ChromaDB.

3_success_criteria.title: Success Criteria
items: All documents and scripts created and functional.
DeepSeek weekly review completed for the specified week.
All work committed and pushed to version control.
Infrastructure described as 'complete' in the session log.

4_decisions.title: Decisions & Rules
items: To create a SYSTEM_MANIFEST.md as the master routing document.
To maintain PROJECT_STATE.md files for project tracking.
To implement a 90-day goal planning document (GOALS_90DAY.md).
To automate session logging and AI review processes.

5_sops.title: SOPs / Workflows
items: Process for creating a state snapshot.
Workflow for running a weekly DeepSeek review (covering specific sections).
Session wrap-up procedure automated via script.

6_scripts.title: Scripts / Commands
items: session_wrapup.py
deepseek_review.py

7_inputs_outputs.title: Inputs & Outputs
items: Inputs: Project context, goals, previous state.
Outputs: SYSTEM_MANIFEST.md, 4 PROJECT_STATE.md files, GOALS_90DAY.md, state snapshot, V7_DAILY_GUIDE.md, ENTERPRISE_OS_EXPLAINED.md, committed code repository.

10_status.title: Status
items: Complete. All planned work finished and committed.

11_progress.title: Progress Markers
items: System discipline infrastructure declared complete.
DeepSeek weekly review for W08 completed (4 out of 7 sections).
All documentation created and scripts built.

12_refinements.title: Refinements
items: Creation of human guides (V7_DAILY_GUIDE.md, ENTERPRISE_OS_EXPLAINED.md) to explain the system.

13_dependencies.title: Dependencies
items: PRJ_Enterprise_Platform project.
Git for version control.
DeepSeek AI for the weekly review.

14_entities.title: Entity Maps
items: PRJ_Enterprise_Platform: The main project.
SYSTEM_MANIFEST.md: Master routing document.
PROJECT_STATE.md: Tracks project status (4 instances).
GOALS_90DAY.md: 90-day goal planning document.
V7_DAILY_GUIDE.md: Human guide for daily use.
ENTERPRISE_OS_EXPLAINED.md: Human guide explaining the system.
session_wrapup.py: Automation script for session logging.
deepseek_review.py: Automation script for AI review.
John: Individual who asked technical questions.
Git, PostgreSQL, ChromaDB: Technologies discussed.

15_glossary.title: Glossary
items: System Discipline Lock-in: The established infrastructure and processes for maintaining project consistency.
DeepSeek Weekly Review: A periodic review conducted by the DeepSeek AI, segmented by week (e.g., W08).
State Snapshot: A captured point-in-time record of the project's status.

16_future.title: Future
items: Implied continuation of weekly DeepSeek reviews (remaining sections).
Use of the newly created guides and automation scripts in daily operations.

17_pending.title: Pending
items: Completion of the remaining 3 sections of the DeepSeek weekly review for W08.

18_questions.title: Open Questions
items: Specific content of John's questions about Git, PostgreSQL, and ChromaDB and the answers provided are not detailed.

19_meta.title: Meta-Observations
items: Session followed a structured wrap-up pattern, culminating in an automated log file.
Emphasis on creating both machine-readable (scripts, manifests) and human-readable (guides) artifacts.

20_assets.title: Reusable Assets
items: SYSTEM_MANIFEST.md template/structure.
PROJECT_STATE.md template/structure.
GOALS_90DAY.md template/structure.
session_wrapup.py script.
deepseek_review.py script.
V7_DAILY_GUIDE.md guide.
ENTERPRISE_OS_EXPLAINED.md guide.

summary: The session successfully established the core system discipline infrastructure for the PRJ_Enterprise_Platform, creating key documentation, automation scripts, and completing a partial weekly AI review, with all outputs committed to version control.
